title: Demystifying TypeScript Discriminated Unions
content:
TypeScript is a wonderful tool for writing JavaScript that scales. Itâ€™s more or less the de facto standard for the web when it comes to large JavaScript projects. As outstanding as it is, there are some tricky pieces for the …

Demystifying TypeScript Discriminated Unions originally published on CSS-Tricks. You should get the newsletter and become a supporter.
description: TypeScript discriminated unions are types where a key or value can be used to differentiate between the keys and values of several types at once.
